movies.title: Zuo ye chang feng
movies.plot: Sai Mingjun and her boyfriend Zuo Sicheng fell in love for many years, let the thought that two people will eventually help to match the Sai did not think of, Zuo unexpectedly in his stomach with his flesh and blood after cruel abandoned her. Under the persuasion of friends, Sai decided to innocent children gave birth to the womb. In order to children's health was raised, Sai had to work hard, with the passage of time, she got the place gradually in the workplace. As everything is better, the coincidence actually make Zuo of Sai's boss, by the authority of, Zuo unceremoniously in working on Sai, want to force her to resign. At this moment, the heir to the chairman of optimum Xie Siwen appears was in before Sai, he not only helped Sai, a strong but can't help falling in love with the kind of woman.
movies.simplePlot: Sai Mingjun and her boyfriend Zuo Sicheng fell in love for many years, let the thought that two people will eventually help to match the Sai did not think of, Zuo unexpectedly in his ...

biography.bio: Ching Wan Lau was born on February 16, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Mad detective (2007), La vie sans principe (2011) and Black Mask (1996). He has been married to Amy Kwok since 1998.
biography.name: Ching Wan Lau

biography.bio: Anita Yuen was born on September 4, 1971 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Wing-Yee Yuen. She is an actress, known for Thunderbolt (1995), Bons baisers de Pékin (1994) and Endless Love (1993). She has been married to Julian Cheung since 2001. They have one child.
biography.name: Anita Yuen

biography.bio: Yue-Yu Chen is an actress, known for Hong fu qi tian (1991), Bastard Swordsman (1983) and S.O.S. maison hantée (1988).
biography.name: Yue-Yu Chen

biography.bio: Donna Chu is an actress, known for Niki Larson (1993), Nie lian (1995) and Gau sing biu choi (1998).
biography.name: Donna Chu

biography.bio: King-Fai Chung was born in March 1937 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Black Mask (1996), Hu Du Men (1996) and The Source of Love (2003).
biography.name: King-Fai Chung

biography.bio: Tamara Guo is an actress, known for Chi luo kuang ben (1993), Hidden Peaks and Dian zi ge men zhan shi (1998).
biography.name: Tamara Guo

biography.bio: Fan Hui is an actress, known for Chinese Box (1997), Ban wo tong hang (1994) and Eat a Bowl of Tea (1989).
biography.name: Fan Hui

biography.bio: Frankie Lam was born on December 19, 1967 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Lam Man-Lung. He is an actor, known for The Merger (2015), Ten Brothers (2007) and Zheng hong qi xia (1991). He has been married to Kenix Kwok since March 10, 2004. They have one child.
biography.name: Frankie Lam

biography.bio: Jamie Luk is an actor and director, known for Rumble in the Bronx (1995), Endless Love (1993) and Driving Miss Wealthy (2004).
biography.name: Jamie Luk

biography.bio: Siu-Wai Mui was born on April 17, 1966 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Look Out, Officer! (1990), When Fortune Smiles (1990) and Pretty Ghost (1991).
biography.name: Siu-Wai Mui

biography.bio: Yan Pak was born on November 30, 1942 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia as Wai-yin Chan. She is an actress, known for The Legend of Drunken Master (1994), Prise de bec à Hong Kong (1988) and Guang gun shen tou shuang cai feng (1978). She has been married to Wong Man Wai since January 16, 1968.
biography.name: Yan Pak

biography.bio: Kwok-Hei Tsang is an actor, known for Man Wanted (1995) and Zuo ye chang feng (1994).
biography.name: Kwok-Hei Tsang

biography.bio: Gei Shun Wai is an actor, known for In the Line of Duty 4 (1989), The Sting (1992) and Yeung gwong ging chaat (1999).
biography.name: Gei Shun Wai
